definitions.definition: To commit tasks and responsibilities to others, especially subordinates .
To commit (a task or responsibility) to someone, especially a subordinate.
To give away authority over a subdomain ; to allow someone else to create sub-subdomains of a subdomain of one's own.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To commit tasks and responsibilities to others, especially subordinates .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To commit (a task or responsibility) to someone, especially a subordinate.
( computing , Internet , transitive ) ( of a subdomain ) To give away authority over a subdomain ; to allow someone else to create sub-subdomains of a subdomain of one's own.
